Behavior Change Principles: Enter the behavior change principle that is the active ingredient in this causal-structural chain here (e.g. a BCT)
Conditions for Effectiveness: Specify the conditions for effectiveness for that BCP and the target population and context here
Applications: Enter the application here (i.e. the BCPs 'tangible' implementation in the intervention)
Sub-determinants (formulated as Change O: Enter the sub-determinant underlying the relevant determinant here (e.g. a belief)
Determinants: Enter the determinant predicting the sub-behavior here
Sub-behaviors (Performance Objectives): Enter the sub-behavior of the target behavior that is targeted in this causal-structural chain here
Target behavior: Enter the target behavior that is the ultimate target of this causal-structural chain here
